Name: Sunflower
About the game: This is an adult only game, with graphic sexual content. Suflower is a Visual Novel centered around a girl named Alina. Alina is a southern belle and loves walking around her sunflower fields near her house. When Alina is not relaxing at her house, she is busy attending LVN University. Alina is a student enrolled in the LVN News Reporting program. With her friends Ivanna and Nadiya, they try their best to investigate a mysterious student that has caused trouble for them in the past. Sunflower also includes a comic book subplot about a girl named Captain Yuri. Captain Yuri is a super hero who can travel between dimensions. Captain Yuri is a funny parody of the super hero genre. Sunflower features background music by Bittersweet Entertainment and Joel Steudler. It also has artwork by gin-1994 (background art) and DemonLordDante (CGs).
